items.title: Kennedy Center to be renamed Trump-Kennedy Center, White House says
items.description: The board of the performing arts centre, which was appointed by Trump, voted to rename it to honour him, the White House press secretary says.

items.title: Ex-Nascar driver and family believed to be among seven killed in US aircrash
items.description: Officials confirm racer Greg Biffle was among those who boarded the small aircraft that crashed at a regional airport in North Carolina.

items.title: Violence breaks out in Bangladesh after death of youth protest leader
items.description: Sharif Osman Hadi was a prominent figure in the movement that ousted former prime minister Sheik Hasina.

items.title: Watch: British woman surfs potentially record-breaking monster wave
items.description: Laura Crane, a 30-year-old from Devon, hopes to have broken a world record for the biggest wave ever surfed by a woman.

items.title: McIlroy wins Sports Personality of the Year 2025
items.description: Rory McIlroy is crowned BBC Sports Personality of the Year for 2025 after clinching the career Grand Slam and playing a key role in Europe's Ryder Cup...
